oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Praktijkonderzoek Plant & Omgeving van Wageningen UR
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Applied Plant Research of Wageningen UR (PPO) integrates knowledge into directly applicable solutions for agricultural chains. Research focus is on sustainable farming systems, quality management in the chain, directing cultivations, plant health, efficient use of resources and organising the rural environment. Contact person for organic agriculture research is Mrs. Greet Blom, head of the IBL (Innovation Centre Organic Agriculture of Wageningen UR).
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Organization} PPO: Praktijkonderzoek Plant & Omgeving van Wageningen UR. [Applied Plant Research of Wageningen UR.] Organization Leader(s): Blom-Zandstra, dr.ir. M. (Greet).
